title: The MF 'Update', What a joke
body:
I'm trying to fully understand this without just facepalming myself unconscious.

Simple question. How, in any way, was MF brought into line with ADC's such as Jinx and Sivir.

How was she updated?? You took away her healing debuff and gave her Teemo's W. Uhm...

Thanks?

replies.body:
passive: no more DoT everslow (but i miss the first-in-enemy-jungle-oh-fuck-help effect)
Q: damage increased, no more minion-derping (but i miss the bounce-trough-minions you could sometimes pull off)
W: cooldown reduced, now also a kiting/escape (but i miss the screw-you-raka effect)
E: now actually slows (but i miss... uh... idk?)
R: now laughs louder (fuck yeah!)
Wait, you also nerfed her Q bounce too, 10/10.
